description: Sunny, cosy East Village studio with private bathroom and kitchen, Air Conditioning and roof access. Close to amazing restaurants, parks, bars, and awesome shopping. It's a 2 minute walk to the L-Train Subway, a 10 minute walk to Union square and a 10 minute subway ride to Williamsburg. Central location walking distance from Soho, the Lower East Side and loads of other cool spots. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers and pets.
name: Sunny, Quiet East Village Studio in Great Locaiton
review: Location was perfect for us in the East Village! Brian gave us some good tips for local food and services, which was very helpful! Would definitely recommend for a couple or close friends to stay at
